Item ID25004

The tier 3 Trailblazer top is a tradeable cosmetic item. It is part of the tier 3 Trailblazer Relic Hunter, which can be purchased for 15,000 League points from the Leagues Reward Shop.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room. It can also be displayed (with the rest of the outfit and the Trailblazer cane) by using it on furniture built in the League hall's outfit stand space.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 January 2021
(update)
  • The item is now obtainable by players.
  • The item's name was changed from "Trailblazer coat (t3)" to "Trailblazer top (t3)".
  • The item's value was increased from 100,000 to 150,000.
28 October 2020
(update)

The item was added to the game.

[[File:Trailblazer top (t3) detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''tier 3 Trailblazer top''' is a tradeable cosmetic item. It is part of the [[Trailblazer Relic Hunter (T3)|tier 3 Trailblazer Relic Hunter]], which can be purchased for 15,000 League points from the [[Leagues Reward Shop]].

{{Costume storage|armour case}} It can also be displayed (with the rest of the outfit and the [[Trailblazer cane]]) by using it on furniture built in the [[League hall]]'s [[outfit stand space]].
